title: [jit][script] Scoping of variables not local to script function is a little weird
body_html:
🐛 Bug

To Reproduce

import torch

def script(fn):
    return torch.jit.script(fn)

def fn():
    def foo(x):
        return x
    def bar(x):
        return foo(x)

    ge = script(bar)

    x = torch.tensor(1.)
    y = foo(x)
    print(y)  

fn()


RuntimeError:
undefined value foo:
def bar(x):
    return foo(x)
           ~~~ <--- HERE

Environment

PT master
